channel.title: Modify Watches: Popular Products
channel.description: A list of the popular products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Blue Face
item.description:
The Blue watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match the this design with any other straps from your Modify collection. The face is made from a scratch-resistant polycarbo..

Price: $25.00
